short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create note tabs and make notes in TinyMCE editor

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Up to 100 tabs
- Change color of tabs
- Swap tabs
- TinyMCE editor with lists, headers, paragraphs, tables, undo/redo and much more
- Import/Export notes
- Completely free, no premium, freemium and ad-free
- Works offline

Start via shortcode: 
Windows: Ctrl+Shift+Y
Mac: Command+Shift+Y
Chromeos: Ctrl+Shift+U
Linux: Ctrl+Shift+J
